trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to and from other data types.
This class differs in two ways from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter>, the default type converter for the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.

Uses a string representation based on the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IetfLanguageTag%2A> property rather than the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> property (i.e., RFC 3066 rather than RFC 1766).
When converting from a string, the properties of the resulting <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object depend only on the string and not on user overrides set in Control Panel.
This makes it possible to create documents the appearance of which do not depend on local settings.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert from a given type.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> being queried for conversion support.
`true` if <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert to a given type.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> being queried for conversion support.
`true` if <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert; otherwise, `false`.
Converts a given object type to a <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object whose value is respected during conversion.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> being converted.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object.
Converts a <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object to a given object type.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object whose value is respected during conversion.
The object that represents the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the returned converted object.
A converted CultureInfo object to a given object type.
